title.rendered: How to Restore Deleted Videos using Dumpster

content.rendered:
With Dumpster, you can recover most video files no matter when you deleted it. It’s as simple as downloading the app from the Google Play store, and waiting a few moments to let Dumpster deep scan your device for the lost file.

Here’s exactly how it works:

You’re freaking out over accidentally deleting your daughter’s graduation day video. You just downloaded Dumpster and are anxiously awaiting the restoration process. 

Once Dumpster is fully installed, the app will start backing up any deleted videos. Once they are detected they’ll appear in Dumpster’s Recycle Bin.

Tap open the Dumpster’s Recycle Bin, and tap the video you want to restore to your Android device. Just like that the video will instantly be restored back to your device gallery.  

Dumpster is proven to work and is trusted by millions of people all over the world. The app can also undelete photo, audio, document, and other types of files. We highly recommend checking out the app for free and using it as a backup. The app has a higher chance of recovering your lost files if you accidentally delete the file while the app is already installed on your device.

You’re better off safe than sorry!
